text: Læa cng xdthn t̀x tạw k̄hxng cêā r̀wm kạb brrdā p̄hū̂ wingwxn t̀x phrap̄hū̂pĕncêāk̄hxng phwk k̄heā thậng yām chêā læa yām yĕn doy prārt̄hnā khwām pordprān k̄hxng phraxngkh̒ læa xỳā h̄ı̂ s̄āytā k̄hxng cêā h̄ạnh̄e xxk cāk phwk k̄heā k̄hṇa thī̀ cêā pras̄ngkh̒ khwām s̄wyngām h̄æ̀ng chīwit k̄hxng lok nī̂ læa cêā xỳā cheụ̄̀xfạng p̄hū̂ thī̀ reā thảh̄ı̂ h̄ạwcı k̄hxng k̄heā laley cāk kār rảlụk t̄hụng reā læa pt̩ibạti tām xārmṇ̒ t̀ả k̄hxng k̄heā læa kickār k̄hxng k̄heā phināṣ̄ s̄ūỵh̄āy
